remarks:
` 1 ` is an identity element for real multiplication.  Axiom 14 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ ax1rid .  Weakened from the original axiom in the form of statement in ~ mulid1 , based on ideas by Eric Schmidt.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-1995.) 

---

 ` 1 ` is an identity element for real multiplication.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ ax1rid .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-1995.)
statement: ax-1rid $p |- ( A e. RR -> ( A x. 1 ) = A ) $.
